description: High energy focus. Prioritizes loud screams (RMS/ZCR) and rapid chat velocity.

prompts.llava: This is a livestream candidate for YouTube Shorts or Highlights. Answer YES or NO only. Is the HUMAN reacting with enough emotional intensity or visual impact to be considered a 'Viral Highlight'? Ignore game characters. Focus on high-energy facial expressions and gestures (screaming, laughing, jumping).
